DataElement.preferredDefinition: A class of publication in which original scientific work is described.  The format usually includes an introduction in which relevant concepts are identified and the experimental system under study is presented, a section describing the experiments that were performed to test a specific hypothesis and the results and observations that were obtained, a section in which the results are discussed relative to findings by other investigators and the current state of knowledge in the field, and a section describing the experimental methods and procedures in sufficient detail to enable the reproduction of the work by independent investigators._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A class of publication in which original scientific work is described.  The format usually includes an introduction in which relevant concepts are identified and the experimental system under study is presented, a section describing the experiments that were performed to test a specific hypothesis and the results and observations that were obtained, a section in which the results are discussed relative to findings by other investigators and the current state of knowledge in the field, and a section describing the experimental methods and procedures in sufficient detail to enable the reproduction of the work by independent investigators._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.
